How VoiceBank Works

Welcome to VoiceBank - Your Voice-Powered Banking Buddy

VoiceBank is here to make your banking experience easier and more fun through the magic of voice commands. To get started, just click on the "Let's Talk" button, and you'll be ready to talk with your bank!

Getting Around

Want to quickly jump to different parts of the website? Just say the name of the section you see at the top of the page. For example, say "Services" or "About," and you'll be whisked away to that spot in a jiffy!

Signing Up or Logging In

Ready to create a new account or access your existing one? It's as easy as saying "Register" or "Login." A window will pop up to help you breeze through the process. To fill in your info, just say the name of the field followed by what you want to type. For instance, say "Email, example@email.com," and like magic, the words you spoke will appear in the email field.

As you explore VoiceBank, you'll find even more voice commands that make banking a piece of cake. Don't be shy, try out different commands and see what works best for you!

How to use!

1

Enable Microphone

Ensure your device's microphone is enabled and that our app has permission to access it.

2

Activate Voice Commands

Look for the "Let's Talk" button in the website and click on it to activate voice commands

3

Speak Clearly

Use commands like "Send money to [Person]" or "Create Account" and speak clearly.
